localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Switch off. Slow down. Sundayy is the mindfulness based social network designed to be checked just once a week. Sundayy represents spending time away from feeds, thinking deeper about our days, and sharing what matters with the people who matter.
blogPost.body: Switch off. Slow down. Sundayy is the mindfulness based social network designed to be checked just once a week. Sundayy represents spending time away from feeds, thinking deeper about our days, and sharing what matters with the people who matter.
blogPost.title: Sundayy - The social network you check once a week, on Sunday.
blogPost.author: Jillian Schuller

localize.description: 关掉。慢下来。Sundayy是基于心灵的社交网络，设计为每周只需检查一次。Sundayy代表着花时间远离feeds，深入思考我们的日子，并与重要的人分享重要的事情。
localize.tagline: 你每周都要检查一次的社交网络，在周日。

localize.description: 關掉。慢下來。Sundayy是基於心靈的社交網絡，設計爲每週只需檢查一次。Sundayy代表着花時間遠離feeds，深入思考我們的日子，並與重要的人分享重要的事情。
localize.tagline: 你每週都要檢查一次的社交網絡，在週日。

previous.excerpt: A growing list of various types of emails (promotional, newsletter, onboarding, etc.) from the best brands, breaking down and highlighting everything you need to know about each email. Learn how the top brands create their emails!
previous.title: Email Spotlights - The best brand emails, annotated.

localize.description: 来自最佳品牌的各种类型的电子邮件（促销、通讯、入职等）的不断增长的列表，分解并突出你需要知道的关于每封电子邮件的一切。了解顶级品牌如何创建他们的电子邮件!
來自最佳品牌的各種類型的電子郵件（促銷、通訊、入職等）的不斷增長的列表，分解並突出你需要知道的關於每封電子郵件的一切。瞭解頂級品牌如何創建他們的電子郵件!

很高興看到小傢伙們贏了......https://t.co/Tn8qIqKNI1。
